mission_data.mission_description: These Are The Voyages... Ep. III^^The Excalibur is ordered to escort a Ximni ambassador amid fears of Torgoth aggression, though all is not as it seems...^^*Recommended for experienced crews*

event.name: Review on Comms
event.incoming_comms_text: An important Ximni ambassador is travelling from one of their colony planets to their homeworld for a key election they are having concerning the Confederation's state of involvement in the war. Capturing the ambassador would be a major coup for the Torgoth or Skaraan, so we're assigning you to make sure everything goes smoothly. I read your report from Wolf 359, and determined the Excalibur would be the best crew to handle such a delicate situation.^^You are to escort Ambassador Pavok safely from Ozanka back to Ximni. ^You will find him at Ozanka spacedock. Once you have him on board, speak with him about the mission.^Do whatever is necessary to keep him safe.

event.name: Triumph Hail
event.incoming_comms_text: Greetings, Terrans! My name is Aurae, elected captain of this vessel for our exchange. We understand that you have buisiness with Ambassador Pavok this fine day, but there is much that we would like to discuss with you before you pick him up at Ozanka spacedock. We would have this conversation on open channels, but feel it is best to speak face to face to maintain confidentiality. Rendezvous with us immediately. As allies we think this matter is of the utmost importance.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: We are being hailed by a Ximni ship on Comms.
COMPUTER: We should not delay our mission.

event.name: Rendezvos With Triumph
event.incoming_comms_text: Glorious allies, we knew you would trust our word and listen to what we have to say!^^Ambassador Pavok has been a great friend of mine for years. We served together on this very ship once upon a time, before he took more interest in strengthening our democracy. As you know we Ximni have frequent elections concerning the state of affairs in this vast universe fairly regularly. Pavok has dedicated his life to keeping our alliance with the USFP and TSN strong for the greater good of free civilizations everywhere. Without him and his council, we would not have been involved with you Terrans for this long. His importance to both our interests cannot be understated.^^That being said, Pavok has not been himself lately.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: The Triumph is hailing us on a secure channel.

event.name: Conversation 1
event.incoming_comms_text: My friends at the spacedock here have informed me that whenever Pavok has been away from the planet surface he's spent his time locked in his room. When he ventures to Ozanka, he goes alone. The other night, when our ship arrived here after a glorious defeat of several Kralien ships, he did not wish to partake in our celebration. We even invited him to fill in the baritone role for a recital of our victory hymn, an offer that he declined! It is unlike a Ximni to not want celebrate the glory of our great Confederacy. But that is just the tip of the iceberg...

event.name: Conversation 2
event.incoming_comms_text: Rumors are circulating that Pavok has been voting... differently, in our elections these past few days. They say he hasn't voted to continue our alliance, and instead wants us to move strictly against the Torgoth and pay no mind to what any USFP members think. ^^He retreated to our colony here, which is a sacred planet for our species on which we hope to usher in a new era for ourselves, without giving much of a reason for visit. This planet is very close to the edge of Torgoth and Skaraan space. If we Ximni hadn't discovered it first, it would likely have been claimed by one of them before you got here. Granted, Pavok is under no obligation to tell anyone his business; however, it is most unusual for a Ximni to hide how they are feeling. We pride ourselves in our honesty. In my opinion, comrade, Pavok is hiding something, and we think it wise for you to be on your guard.

set_comms_button.text: While your concerns are noted, these are stressful times. Pavok may just be committed to his work right now.
The Ambassador surely could be up to something. We will keep a close eye on him. If he doesn't trust us, why should we trust him.

event.name: Possible Response 1

if_comms_button.text: The Ambassador surely could be up to something. We will keep a close eye on him. If he doesn't trust us, why should we trust him.

clear_comms_button.text: The Ambassador surely could be up to something. We will keep a close eye on him. If he doesn't trust us, why should we trust him.

event.incoming_comms_text: Thank you for your time, Excalibur, and godspeed!

clear_comms_button.text: While your concerns are noted, these are stressful times. Pavok may just be committed to his work right now.

event.name: Possible Response 2

if_comms_button.text: While your concerns are noted, these are stressful times. Pavok may just be committed to his work right now.

clear_comms_button.text: The Ambassador surely could be up to something. We will keep a close eye on him. If he doesn't trust us, why should we trust him.
While your concerns are noted, these are stressful times. Pavok may just be committed to his work right now.

event.incoming_comms_text: Perhaps you are right. Be safe, Excalibur.

event.name: Approaching Spacedock
event.incoming_comms_text: Ah, Excalibur! It's about time you arrived. I am eagerly awaiting our journey together. I will come aboard your vessel when you dock here at Ozanka spacedock!

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Pavok is hailing us on Comms.

event.name: Docking

set_comms_button.text: It is our duty that our allies are kept safe. Enjoy your stay on Excalibur.
Ozanka is certainly most beautiful. What exactly were you doing here, Ambassador?

event.incoming_comms_text: This is quite the ship you have here! Now that my business on the planet Ozanka is concluded, I am ready for you to escort me back to Ximni. I trust you Terrans have good reason if you deem it necessary that you accompany me home, but I do think you worry too much. I am grateful for our most honorable partnership in this war. Let us be on our way!

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: The Ambassador is boarding. Discuss mission on Comms.

event.name: Trustworty

if_comms_button.text: It is our duty that our allies are kept safe. Enjoy your stay on Excalibur.

clear_comms_button.text: It is our duty that our allies are kept safe. Enjoy your stay on Excalibur.
Ozanka is certainly most beautiful. What exactly were you doing here, Ambassador?

event.incoming_comms_text: Thank you! I will be retiring to my room now, friends. Long live the alliance!

event.name: Untrustworthy

if_comms_button.text: Ozanka is certainly most beautiful. What exactly were you doing here, Ambassador?

clear_comms_button.text: It is our duty that our allies are kept safe. Enjoy your stay on Excalibur.
Ozanka is certainly most beautiful. What exactly were you doing here, Ambassador?

event.incoming_comms_text: It is indeed, especially compared to our homeworld. My business is my own, I'm sure you understand. I will be retiring to my room now. We must delay no longer. Long live the alliance.^

set_ship_text.name: Rendezvous Point
set_ship_text.desc: COMPUTER: Bring Excalibur to this point to exit the sector.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: A Torgoth ship is on an intercept course. They are hailing us.

event.name: Torgoth Hail

set_comms_button.text: Chameleon? What are you talking about?

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Raising shields. Recommend going to red alert.

event.incoming_comms_text: Attention, Terran vessel! While we would love for your blood to be on our hands today, we do not wish to be played for fools any longer by the chameleon on your vessel. Hand him over now, or we will destroy the both of you!

event.name: Chameleon?

if_comms_button.text: Chameleon? What are you talking about?

set_comms_button.text: Pavok, what do you have to say for yourself?

event.incoming_comms_text: The "Ambassador" on your ship is not who they claim to be, Terran! They are an Arvonian in cahoots with the Skaraan. Arvonians are able to manipulate the color of their skin as well as physical features to such a perfect level that they can imitate other living things, or blend with their environments. ^^Torgoth parliament has discovered recently that we have been being spied on by our supposed Hegemony "allies", and that they have been manipulating us by appealing to our nature and hunger for war! They plan on running our resources dry and taking all of our splendor for themselves, but we Torgoth are not brainless! This Arvonian on your ship is trying to split the alliance so that the Skaraan, Kraliens, and Arvonians can take out both the Ximni and TSN, while overwhelming us on two fronts. For now, our interests align. Now beam the imposter over so I may stab him through the heart!

clear_comms_button.text: Chameleon? What are you talking about?

event.name: Pavok Choice

if_comms_button.text: Pavok, what do you have to say for yourself?

clear_comms_button.text: Pavok, what do you have to say for yourself?

event.incoming_comms_text: I do not know why you are entertaining this Torgoth's meritless claim. They have no proof that I am Arvonian. Consider the fact that you were sent here to protect me from a potential Hegemony coup. Well, the Torgoth ARE a member of the Hegemony. Is it not more likely that this is merely a diversion to prevent us from exiting the sector before these whale-hunting scum can attack us?

set_comms_button.text: You are right, Pavok. We must follow our TSN orders and protect you.
If you are really Pavok, then you will report to sickbay for testing.

event.name: Trust Pavok

if_comms_button.text: You are right, Pavok. We must follow our TSN orders and protect you.

clear_comms_button.text: If you are really Pavok, then you will report to sickbay for testing.
You are right, Pavok. We must follow our TSN orders and protect you.

event.incoming_comms_text: Fine! We will destroy the Arvonian! We didn't want it to come to this, but we are glad it did because now we can destroy you as well!

event.name: Trust Torgoth

if_comms_button.text: If you are really Pavok, then you will report to sickbay for testing.

event.incoming_comms_text: You're making a big mistake.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Unauthorized use of transporter room detected.

clear_comms_button.text: You are right, Pavok. We must follow our TSN orders and protect you.
If you are really Pavok, then you will report to sickbay for testing.

event.name: Triumph Discovery
event.incoming_comms_text: Excalibur! It's Aurae of the Triumph of Zhul! Ozanka spacedock just informed me that Pavok's dead body was discovered locked away in his quarters on the station! You have an imposter on your ship!

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Incoming emergency hail on Comms.

event.name: Security

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: "Pavok" has beamed off the ship.

event.incoming_comms_text: Captain, he is not in his cell! And our shields have been deactivated!

event.name: Don't Let Him Get Away
event.incoming_comms_text: You must not let the Arvonians escape! Take them dead or alive!

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Enemy decloaking in sector C5. Raising shields.

event.name: Security

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: "Pavok" has beamed off the ship.

event.incoming_comms_text: Captain, he is not in his cell! And our shields have been deactivated!

event.name: Don't Let Him Get Away
event.incoming_comms_text: You must not let the Arvonians escape! Take them dead or alive!

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Enemy decloaking in sector C5

event.name: Skaraan A
event.incoming_comms_text: Looks like a Skaraan ship just decloaked in the Nebula! The Arvonians must have been trying to group up with them for an escape. We must take them down!

event.name: Skaraan B
event.incoming_comms_text: Looks like a Skaraan ship just decloaked in the Nebula! The Arvonians must have been trying to group up with them for an escape. We must take them down!

event.name: Arvonian Surrender/Skaraan Surrender
event.incoming_comms_text: Well done, Excalibur. We have taken the imposter prisoner. If the Arvonians and Skaraan are plotting espionage not just against the Earth-Ximni alliance, but their Torgoth allies as well, this could change the whole dynamic of the war. We must act quickly. Report what happened here to the USFP, and join us for some drinks back at Ozanka spacedock!

event.name: Arvonian Destroyed/Skaraan Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Impressive, Terrans. If the Arvonians and Skaraan are plotting espionage not just against your meager alliance, but us as well, this could change the whole dynamic of the war. I'm sure your Commanders would be most interested in what transpired today. ^^We will do battle one day, Terran, but for now our interests align. Don't cross us.

event.name: Arvonian Destroyed/Skaraan Surrendered
event.incoming_comms_text: Impressive, Terrans. If the Arvonians and Skaraan are plotting espionage not just against your meager alliance, but us as well, this could change the whole dynamic of the war. I'm sure your Commanders would be most interested in what transpired today. ^^We will do battle one day, Terran, but for now our interests align. Don't cross us.

event.name: Arvonian Surrender/Skaraan Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Well done, Excalibur. We have taken the imposter prisoner. If the Arvonians and Skaraan are plotting espionage not just against the Earth-Ximni alliance, but their Torgoth allies as well, this could change the whole dynamic of the war. We must act quickly. Report what happened here to the USFP, and join us for some drinks back at Ozanka spacedock!

big_message.title: MISSION SUCCESS!
big_message.subtitle1: You foiled a Hegemony plot to split the Earth-Ximni alliance!

event.incoming_comms_text: Well done, Excalibur. We have taken the imposter prisoner. If the Arvonians and Skaraan are plotting espionage not just against the Earth-Ximni alliance, but their Torgoth allies as well, this could change the whole dynamic of the war. We must act quickly. Report what happened here to the USFP, and join us for some drinks back at Ozanka spacedock!

event.name: Arvonian Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Well done, Excalibur. If the Arvonians and Skaraan are plotting espionage not just against the Earth-Ximni alliance, but their Torgoth allies as well, this could change the whole dynamic of the war. We must act quickly. Report what happened here to the USFP, and join us for some drinks back at Ozanka spacedock!

big_message.title: MISSION SUCCESS!
big_message.subtitle1: You foiled a Hegemony plot to split the Earth-Ximni alliance!
